4121537914.description: menu_category contains the creative group name and category for this item.

category.description: Creative category where this item belongs. Defaults to "none".
category.title: CreativeItemCategory

group.description: The Creative Group that this item belongs to. Group name is limited to 256 characters. The name also must start with a namespace.

is_hidden_in_commands.description: Determines whether or not this item can be used with commands. Defaults to false.

4121537914.title: menu_category

description: Contains the required identifier for the item. May contain optional fields like menu_category.

identifier.description: Unique name for the item that must include a namespace and must not use the Minecraft namespace unless overriding a Vanilla item.

menu_category.description: menu_category contains the creative group name and category for this item.

title: description
